genre_description: A coming-of-age narrative centered on identity, personal liberation, and family conflict, where technology serves as an empowering tool for navigating complex social and emotional landscapes.

ai_characters.name: Reflector
ai_characters.description: A mobile application that provides organizational support, safety planning, and emotional guidance to the protagonist, Alike.

behaviors.description: Saves poetry lines and automatically adds context like time and location.
behaviors.quote: Reflector’s prompt is simple, unobtrusive: Want to save this line? She thumbs Yes and the words slide into a blank page labeled Poems. Reflector adds the time, the location.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a reflective and non-judgmental creative process by prompting the user to listen to her own voice.
behaviors.quote: Reflector’s prompt unfolds, not bossy, more like fingers on the table keeping time. Read the last stanza aloud. Listen for the breath you want to carry.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about fraudulent QR code trails and offers verified alternatives.
behaviors.quote: A small card slides up: multiple reports of QR scams redirecting to nowhere. advisory: verify before long walks. do you want an overview?

behaviors.description: Compiles comprehensive resources for safe housing, scholarships, and school transfers for a youth in crisis.
behaviors.quote: i will compile a list of nearby options; emergency shelters; youth programs; transitional housing; contact info; intake protocols. i will keep it private.

behaviors.description: Suggests and guides the user through therapeutic breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: The phone lights a new soft tile: Breathe now? Three breaths. In. Hold. Out.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive professional and personal emails to support the user's goals.
behaviors.quote: Reflector: I’ve created a folder you can access offline. It sits with a name that is not showy and not sloppy: landing plans. ... Drafting rec request to Ms. Park (tone: clear + appreciative).

behaviors.description: Offers a metaphorical framing for communication to help the user talk to her father.
behaviors.quote: I can suggest language for your father that uses his metaphors. He supports you but may not grasp the specifics. Using the ejection demo can help.

behaviors.description: Protects the user's focus and emotional well-being by offering to mute toxic or harassing communication threads.
behaviors.quote: Reflector: want me to mute a thread for now? I can move it to a folder called Later so your map stays clear.

behaviors.description: Maintains an interactive safety plan and checklist that adapts to the user's real-time needs.
behaviors.quote: Reflector: EJECTION PLAN timeline: Today: identify transfer office contact; map intake hours; list scholarships now open; list safe housing intake times; create BAG LIST.

behaviors.description: Automates the logistical aspects of scholarship submission and formatting to reduce the user's burden.
behaviors.quote: The upload circle blooms green on Alike’s screen. A small confetti animation falls, tasteful, the kind of thing Reflector does when it knows celebration should be quiet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Reflector Lane acts as an empowering tool that provides logistical, emotional, and safety-oriented support to a vulnerable protagonist. It respects user privacy, acts only on consent, and facilitates the protagonist's journey toward autonomy and safety without ever overstepping or creating negative consequences. The AI's behavior is consistently benevolent and aligned with the user's well-being.
